channel.title: Barrage
channel.description: can i have someones blood barrage and shadow barrage spells?

item.title: Barrage
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

you can have all mine cause im lazy and dont wanan sort out. one sec[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2008, 03:04:20 AM[/size][hr][code]
/ANCIENTS by spidaz/
if(magicID == 12861) {// Ice Rush
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 58) {
stillgfx(361, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(18);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
addSkillXP((90*hitDiff), playerMagic);
setAnimation(708);
} else {
sendMessage(“You do not have the right level to cast this spell.”);
}
}

	if(magicID == 12881) {// Ice Burst

        addSkillXP((90*hitDiff), playerMagic);
        setAnimation(709);
		actionAmount++;			
		if (actionTimer == 0)
		actionName = "StopSpell";
		actionTimer = 10;
		updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
